cast.name: 亚历克斯·吉奥古利斯 Alexis Georgoulis
尤尔根·塔拉施 Jürgen Tarrach
科斯塔斯·萨默 Kostas Sommer
仙尼娅·卡洛格罗普卢 Xenia Kalogeropoulou

introduction: Rieke and Leonie manage a travel agency in Wuppertal and now Rieke is the driver of the bus of the travel agency on tour in Greece.At night Rieke has arrived at the Piraeus: the bus was parked before the hotel.In the night Rieke has a nightmare and on the morning when she goes to the balcony and looked at the street the bus has disappeared.Her sister Leonie tells her by phone that she must get from the police a certificate of theft and also the ticket of the parking place.She goes the police station, the police commissioner was busy feeding his young boy and then had to leave his office.Then when she was crossing the street, she didn't see that pedestrians had to wait, then she broke the heel of a shoe and a lorry was coming towards her.A Greek man saves her life: he is taxi driver and his name is Yannis.Then Yannis helped her to buy new shoes ,Rieke explains him the theft of the bus and that a insurance agent will arrive tomorrow at Athena.Yannis thinks that he has a solution for Rieke's problem.
